thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-PriceSmart Says January Sales Rose 6.2 Pct To $243.6 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-PriceSmart Says January Sales Rose 6.2 Pct To $243.6 Mln
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Pricesmart Inc:
* PRICESMART ANNOUNCES JANUARY SALES * JANUARY SALES ROSE 6.2 PERCENT TO $243.6 MILLION * PRICESMART - FOR 4 WEEKS ENDED JAN 28, COMP WAREHOUSE SALES FOR 39 WAREHOUSE CLUBS OPEN AT LEAST 13-1/2 FULL MONTHS INCREASED 0.5% VERSUS LAST YEAR
* PRICESMART - FOR FIVE MONTHS ENDED JANUARY 31, NET SALES INCREASED 4.7% TO $1,333.1 MILLION FROM $1,273.7 MILLION IN SAME PERIOD LAST YEAR
* PRICESMART - FOR 21-WEEK PERIOD ENDED JANUARY 28, COMP WAREHOUSE SALES INCREASED 2.9% VERSUS COMPARABLE 21-WEEK PERIOD A YEAR AGO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
